pickAndExecuteAnAction

public boolean pickAndExecuteAnAction()
Description copied from class: Agent
Agents must implement this scheduler to perform any actions appropriate for the current state. Will be called whenever a state change has occurred, and will be called repeated as long as it returns true.

Specified by:
pickAndExecuteAnAction in class Agent
Returns:
true if some action was executed that might have changed the state.

eventFired

public void eventFired(TChannel channel,
                       TEvent event,
                       java.lang.Object[] args)
Description copied from class: Agent
Agents must implement this method in order to communicate with the transducer. This allows them to listen to events fired by the front end. NOTE: All implementations of this method should be synchronized!

Specified by:
eventFired in interface TReceiver
Specified by:
eventFired in class Agent
Parameters:
channel - the channel the event was fired on
event - the event type
args - any arguments the message needs
